snippet: Chase has agreed to settle a lawsuit over the way it charges fees to customers who overspend their accounts.
abstract: Chase has agreed to settle a lawsuit over the way it charges fees to customers who overspend their accounts.
lead_paragraph: J.P. Morgan Chase has agreed to pay $110 million to settle a class-action suit challenging the way it charged debit card fees to customers who spent more than what was in their accounts.

headline.main: Chase Agrees to Settle Lawsuit on Overdraft Fees
